meanings.definition: A person who participates in ultramarathons.
meanings.sent1: The ultramarathoner crossed the finish line after running 50 miles.
meanings.sent2: Many ultramarathoners enjoy the challenge of running for hours on end.
meanings.sent3: The ultramarathoner joked that their idea of a relaxing weekend was running a hundred miles.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her an ultramarathoner, conquering every race she entered.
meanings.sent5: The ultramarathoner's endurance was unmatched, inspiring others to push their limits.

meanings.definition: One who competes in races longer than the traditional marathon distance.
meanings.sent1: As an ultramarathoner, he trained rigorously for the upcoming 100-mile race.
meanings.sent2: The ultramarathoner's dedication to running ultra distances was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The ultramarathoner decided to celebrate finishing the race by running an extra 10 miles for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to being an ultramarathoner was evident in her consistent training schedule.
meanings.sent5: The ultramarathoner's passion for long-distance running fueled her desire to break records.
